label: HandleKnowExperience
m: Right after getting my degree, I started working on a cool R&D project called Pic4Turtle
Since mid 2016, I switched to a startup called KUAU, committed to radically change secundary education in Brazil.
My job description was technical lead. This means quite a lot of tasks.

From deciding which technologies to use, to designing and prioritizing features, building the software architecture, coordinating the project, selecting other members of the team and speaking at company events
Now I'm at James, the Credit Risk AI, as a Data Science Engineer.

q: Willing to know better one of such projects?
